plot: Mr Bean and Teddy remember past experiences, like the time Mr Bean went to the dentist, when he fell asleep in church or when the Christmas turkey wound up on his head and even the time a tank crushed his Mini.

Mr. Bean and Teddy venture into the loft to look for an umbrella and uncover items from past experiences, like the time Mr. Bean had to dress himself on the way to the dentist, or the time he fell asleep in church or when the Christmas turkey wound up on his head and even the time a tank crushed his Mini.—Dylan Self <robocoptng986127@aol.com>
